page.title: 14The Rover Works & others
page.content: The biggest single factory in Solihull is The Rover Works. It is there that the famous Rover cars and Land Rovers are built. The Rover Company came to the area during World War II. As well as a massive factory the company has a test track and sporting and social facilities. The works covered nearly the whole of one of the kilometre squares. Close by the Rover Works is a small industrial estate with a large number of small manufacturing firms. Although these are the only industrial areas in our block, Solihull itself has an increasing number of industrial sites and more and more people are finding jobs in Solihull and not merely living there. Future plans incude a new industrial park and a high tech area close to the National Exhibition Centre.
